QuestData.Title: Falling to Pieces
QuestData.Description: Why would the saurok have amber? More importantly, why would Oracle Hiss'ir be so protective of it?$b$bIt is unlikely this came from the heavily guarded Zan'vess, so where did it come from?$b$bPerhaps the Klaxxi will know what to make of it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Glowing Amber to Kaz'tik the Manipulator.
QuestData.RewardText: You were wise to bring this to us. This is a piece of another paragon's encasing amber.$b$bThe damage suggests the paragon may be in trouble.$b$bI will speak with the council to decide what should be done next.
